fulldailylineup.name: Alien
fulldailylineup.title: ALIEN
fulldailylineup.description: The original classic! The frightening, intense story of the discovery of a vicious alien species by blue-collar space crew has become a sci-fi landmark. Oscar-winner for Best Visual Effects, directed by Ridley Scott.

details.Cast: Tom Skerritt, Sigourney Weaver, John Hurt, Veronica Cartwright, Harry Dean Stanton, Ian Holm, Yaphet Kotto
details.Description: The original classic! The frightening, intense story of the discovery of a vicious alien species by blue-collar space crew has become a sci-fi landmark. Oscar-winner for Best Visual Effects, directed by Ridley Scott.
details.Title: Alien

fulldailylineup.name: Johnny Mnemonic
fulldailylineup.title: JOHNNY MNEMONIC
fulldailylineup.description: Bad guys and a crazed cyborg pursue a data courier - a man whose job is to transport classified information on a computer chip implanted in his head - before his brain melts! Screenplay by cyberpunk author William Gibson.

details.Cast: Keanu Reeves, Dolph Lundgren, Takeshi, Ice-T, Dina Meyer, Udo Kier, Denis Akiyama, Henry Rollins, Tracy Tweed, Don Francks, Barbara Sukowa
details.Description: Bad guys and a crazed cyborg pursue a data courier - a man whose job is to transport classified information on a computer chip implanted in his head - before his brain melts! Screenplay by cyberpunk author William Gibson.
details.Title: Johnny Mnemonic

fulldailylineup.name: Phantoms
fulldailylineup.title: PHANTOMS
fulldailylineup.description: A professor reduced to selling his supernatural theories to tabloids realizes - when a small Colorado ski town gets wiped out - that the Ancient Enemy, destroyer of civilizations, has returned! With Ben Affleck, Liev Schrieber.

details.Cast: Peter O'Toole, Rose McGowan, Ben Affleck, Joanna Going, Liev Schreiber, Nicky Katt, Clifton Powell, Rick Otto, Rachel Shane, Adam Nelson, John Hammil, John Scott Clough, Michael DeLorenzo
details.Description: A professor reduced to selling his supernatural theories to tabloids realizes - when a small Colorado ski town gets wiped out - that the Ancient Enemy, destroyer of civilizations, has returned! With Ben Affleck, Liev Schrieber.
details.Title: Phantoms

fulldailylineup.name: Fire In The Sky
fulldailylineup.title: FIRE IN THE SKY
fulldailylineup.description: In the White Mountains of Arizona, a man disappears after being hit by a light from the sky. When he suddenly reappears five days later, he has terrifying memories of an alien abduction.

details.Cast: D.B. Sweeney, Robert Patrick, Craig Sheffer, Peter Berg, James Garner, Henry Thomas, Bradley Gregg, Noble Willingham, Kathleen Wilhoite, Georgia Emelin, Scott MacDonald, Wayne Grace
details.Description: In the White Mountains of Arizona, a man disappears after being hit by a light from the sky. When he suddenly reappears five days later, he has terrifying memories of an alien abduction.
details.Title: Fire In The Sky

fulldailylineup.name: The Butterfly Effect
fulldailylineup.title: BUTTERFLY EFFECT, THE
fulldailylineup.description: A young man discovers he has the ability to project himself back through time, where he tries to alter tragic incidents in his history - but that causes problems in the present in this mind-blowing thriller.

details.Cast: Ashton Kutcher, Amy Smart, William Lee Scott, Elden Henson, Melora Walters, Eric Stoltz, Callum Keith Rennie, Ethan Suplee, Kevin Schmidt, Logan Lerman, Irene Gorovaia, Jesse James, John Patrick Amedori
details.Description: A young man discovers he has the ability to project himself back through time, where he tries to alter tragic incidents in his history - but that causes problems in the present in this mind-blowing thriller.
details.Title: The Butterfly Effect

fulldailylineup.name: WarGames
fulldailylineup.title: WARGAMES
fulldailylineup.description: Matthew Broderick stars as a computer gaming whiz who hacks into a military network, and accidentally starts the countdown to World War III. Can he stop the countdown before it launches the ultimate endgame?

details.Cast: Matthew Broderick, Dabney Coleman, Ally Sheedy, John Wood, Barry Corbin, Juanin Clay
details.Description: Matthew Broderick stars as a computer gaming whiz who hacks into a military network, and accidentally starts the countdown to World War III. Can he stop the countdown before it launches the ultimate endgame?
details.Title: WarGames

fulldailylineup.name: Guardians Of The Galaxy
fulldailylineup.title: GUARDIANS OF THE GALAXY
fulldailylineup.description: The Marvel comic comes to life! Five crazy loners - including a sharpshooting raccoon and a humanoid tree - discover they must band together to save the universe in this whip-smart, wise-cracking sci-fi adventure.

details.Cast: Chris Pratt, Zoe Saldana, Dave Bautista, Vin Diesel, Bradley Cooper, Lee Pace, Michael Rooker, Karen Gillan, Djimon Hounsou, Benicio Del Toro, John C Reilly, Glenn Close, Laura Haddock, Sean Gunn, Peter Serafinowicz, Christopher Fairbank
details.Description: The Marvel comic comes to life! Five crazy loners - including a sharpshooting raccoon and a humanoid tree - discover they must band together to save the universe in this whip-smart, wise-cracking sci-fi adventure.
details.Title: Guardians Of The Galaxy

fulldailylineup.name: Gattaca
fulldailylineup.title: GATTACA
fulldailylineup.description: In a future where genetic engineered people are favored, an imperfect young man assumes another's identity to gain a job as an astronaut - but his deception is discovered in this thoughtful sci-fi drama. With Jude Law.

details.Cast: Ethan Hawke, Uma Thurman, Jude Law, Gore Vidal, Alan Arkin, Loren Dean, Jayne Brook, Elias Koteas, Chad Christ, William Lee Scott, Tony Shalhoub, Ernest Borgnine
details.Description: In a future where genetic engineered people are favored, an imperfect young man assumes another's identity to gain a job as an astronaut - but his deception is discovered in this thoughtful sci-fi drama. With Jude Law.
details.Title: Gattaca

fulldailylineup.name: Alien Vs. Predator
fulldailylineup.title: ALIEN VS. PREDATOR
fulldailylineup.description: Scientists converge in Antarctica, where strange heat pulses reveal an ancient civilization, a massive under-the-ice pyramid - and an all out war between the Aliens and Predators!

details.Cast: Lance Henriksen, Sanaa Lathan, Raoul Bova, Ewen Bremner, Colin Salmon, Tommy Flanagan, Joseph Rye, Carsten Norgaard, Sam Troughton, Ian Whyte

details.Title: Alien Vs. Predator

fulldailylineup.name: The Arrival
fulldailylineup.title: ARRIVAL, THE
fulldailylineup.description: An astrophysicist stumbles upon an extraterrestrial signal from outer space. But when his discovery is buried, he visits a secret South American research center and finds that shapeshifting aliens have begun terraforming the planet.

details.Cast: Charlie Sheen, Ron Silver, Lindsay Crouse, Teri Polo, Richard Schiff, Tony T Johnson, Leon Rippy, Buddy Joe Hooker
details.Description: An astrophysicist stumbles upon an extraterrestrial signal from outer space. But when his discovery is buried, he visits a secret South American research center and finds that shapeshifting aliens have begun terraforming the planet.
details.Title: The Arrival

fulldailylineup.name: Doom
fulldailylineup.title: DOOM
fulldailylineup.description: A group of space marines are sent to investigate strange events at a remote research facility on Mars, but once they arrive, they find themselves at the mercy of genetically altered killing machines.

fulldailylineup.name: John Carpenter's They Live
fulldailylineup.title: JOHN CARPENTER'S THEY LIVE
fulldailylineup.description: A drifter discovers a pair of sunglasses that reveal the true nature of the world - aliens in human disguise are running the planet! Now he begins a one-man war to defeat the invaders in John Carpenter's (Halloween) cult classic!

fulldailylineup.name: Terminator 2: Judgment Day
fulldailylineup.title: TERMINATOR 2: JUDGMENT DAY
fulldailylineup.description: A decade after the original Terminator was destroyed, a second killing machine arrives from 2029 - but this time his mission is to protect her son, the future leader of the human resistance, from an even deadlier cyborg.

fulldailylineup.name: Mad Max
fulldailylineup.title: MAD MAX
fulldailylineup.description: The original Australian cult classic: in the near future, an ex-cop searches the dangerous outback for the vicious cycle gang who killed his wife and child. The film that put Mel Gibson on the map, followed by two big-budget sequels.

details.Cast: Mel Gibson, Joanne Samuel, Hugh Keays-Byrne, Steve Bisley, Roger Ward, Vincent Gil, Tim Burns, Geoff Parry, Paul Johnstone, John Ley, Jonathan Hardy, Sheila Florence

fulldailylineup.name: Videodrome
fulldailylineup.title: VIDEODROME
fulldailylineup.description: A sleazy cable tv operator happens upon a mysterious, violent torture show - and discovers it's gruesome tool designed for global mind control! A cult classic from director David Cronenberg (The Fly).

details.Description: A sleazy cable tv operator happens upon a mysterious, violent torture show - and discovers it's gruesome tool designed for global mind control! A cult classic from director David Cronenberg (The Fly).

fulldailylineup.name: Flash Gordon
fulldailylineup.title: FLASH GORDON

fulldailylineup.title: ALIENS

fulldailylineup.title: INVASION OF THE BODY SNATCHERS

fulldailylineup.title: STARMAN

saturday_2015_11_28.title: TERMINATOR 2: JUDGMENT DAY
saturday_2015_11_28.description: A decade after the original Terminator was destroyed, a second killing machine arrives from 2029 - but this time his mission is to protect her son, the future leader of the human resistance, from an even deadlier cyborg.

details.Cast: Arnold Schwarzenegger, Linda Hamilton, Edward Furlong, Robert Patrick, Earl Boen, Joe Morton, S. Epatha Merkerson, Castulo Guerra, Danny Cooksey, Jeanette Goldstein, Xander Berkeley, Jenette Goldstein
details.Description: A decade after the original Terminator was destroyed, a second killing machine arrives from 2029 - but this time his mission is to protect her son, the future leader of the human resistance, from an even deadlier cyborg.
details.Title: Terminator 2: Judgment Day

saturday_2015_11_28.name: X-Men 2
saturday_2015_11_28.title: X2: X-MEN UNITED
saturday_2015_11_28.description: As Magneto's mutants come close to murdering the president, the military sets up a plan to eradicate Charles Xavier's school - the X-Men now have two foes to conquer!

details.Cast: Patrick Stewart, Hugh Jackman, Ian McKellen, Halle Berry, Famke Janssen, James Marsden, Rebecca Romijn-Stamos, Anna Paquin, Aaron Stanford, Kelly Hu, Brian Cox, Alan Cumming, Bruce Davison, Shawn Ashmore, Katie Stuart, Kea Wong
details.Copyright: © 2003 20TH CENTURY FOX FILM CORP. X-MEN CHARACTER NAMES AND THEIR DISTINCTIVE LIKENESS TM & (C) 2003 MARVEL ENTERTAINMENT LLC AND ITS SUBSIDIARIES. ALL RIGHTS RESERVED
details.Description: As Magneto's mutants come close to murdering the president, the military sets up a plan to eradicate Charles Xavier's school - the X-Men now have two foes to conquer!
details.Title: X-Men 2

saturday_2015_11_28.name: Men In Black
saturday_2015_11_28.title: MEN IN BLACK
saturday_2015_11_28.description: Hilarious sci-fi adventure about two secret government agents whose job is to police alien activity on Earth. The men in black must track down an intergalactic terrorist and prevent the planet's destruction.

details.Cast: Tommy Lee Jones, Will Smith, Linda Fiorentino, Vincent Phillip D'Onofrio, Rip Torn, Tony Shalhoub, Sergio Calderon, Siobhan Fallon, Carel Struycken, Michael Willis, Vincent D'Onofrio
details.Description: Hilarious sci-fi adventure about two secret government agents whose job is to police alien activity on Earth. The men in black must track down an intergalactic terrorist and prevent the planet's destruction.
details.Title: Men In Black

sunday_2015_11_29.name: The Butterfly Effect
sunday_2015_11_29.title: BUTTERFLY EFFECT, THE
sunday_2015_11_29.description: A young man discovers he has the ability to project himself back through time, where he tries to alter tragic incidents in his history - but that causes problems in the present in this mind-blowing thriller.

details.Cast: Ashton Kutcher, Amy Smart, William Lee Scott, Elden Henson, Melora Walters, Eric Stoltz, Callum Keith Rennie, Ethan Suplee, Kevin Schmidt, Logan Lerman, Irene Gorovaia, Jesse James, John Patrick Amedori
details.Description: A young man discovers he has the ability to project himself back through time, where he tries to alter tragic incidents in his history - but that causes problems in the present in this mind-blowing thriller.
details.Title: The Butterfly Effect

sunday_2015_11_29.name: Videodrome
sunday_2015_11_29.title: VIDEODROME
sunday_2015_11_29.description: A sleazy cable tv operator happens upon a mysterious, violent torture show - and discovers it's gruesome tool designed for global mind control! A cult classic from director David Cronenberg (The Fly).

details.Cast: James Woods, Deborah Harry, Sonja Smits, Peter Dvorsky, Les Carlson, Jack Creley, Lynne Gorman, Julie Khaner
details.Description: A sleazy cable tv operator happens upon a mysterious, violent torture show - and discovers it's gruesome tool designed for global mind control! A cult classic from director David Cronenberg (The Fly).
details.Title: Videodrome

sunday_2015_11_29.name: John Carpenter's They Live
sunday_2015_11_29.title: JOHN CARPENTER'S THEY LIVE
sunday_2015_11_29.description: A drifter discovers a pair of sunglasses that reveal the true nature of the world - aliens in human disguise are running the planet! Now he begins a one-man war to defeat the invaders in John Carpenter's (Halloween) cult classic!

details.Cast: Roddy Piper, Keith David, Meg Foster, George "Buck" Flower, Peter Jason, Raymond St. Jacques, Jason Robards II, Larry Franco, Jason Robards, Jason Robards III, George ``Buck'' Flower
details.Description: A drifter discovers a pair of sunglasses that reveal the true nature of the world - aliens in human disguise are running the planet! Now he begins a one-man war to defeat the invaders in John Carpenter's (Halloween) cult classic!
details.Title: John Carpenter's They Live

sunday_2015_11_29.name: Invasion Of The Body Snatchers
sunday_2015_11_29.title: INVASION OF THE BODY SNATCHERS
sunday_2015_11_29.description: The original sci-fi classic! A couple discover that plant-life pods from outer space are replacing ordinary citizens in their small town.

details.Cast: Kevin McCarthy, Dana Wynter, Carolyn Jones, Larry Cates, King Donovan, Jean Willes, Ralph Dumke, Virginia Christine, Tom Fadden, Kenneth Patterson, Guy Way, Pat O'Malley, Whit Bissell, Larry Gates
details.Description: The original sci-fi classic! A couple discover that plant-life pods from outer space are replacing ordinary citizens in their small town.
details.Title: Invasion Of The Body Snatchers

sunday_2015_11_29.name: Invasion Of The Body Snatchers
sunday_2015_11_29.title: INVASION OF THE BODY SNATCHERS
sunday_2015_11_29.description: San Francisco residents are slowly being replaced by emotionless replicas, and it's up to a handful of humans to stop the invasion! A chilling remake of the sci-fi classic, with Leonard Nimoy.

details.Cast: Donald Sutherland, Brooke Adams, Leonard Nimoy, Veronica Cartwright, Jeff Goldblum, Art Hindle, Lelia Goldoni, Kevin McCarthy
details.Description: San Francisco residents are slowly being replaced by emotionless replicas, and it's up to a handful of humans to stop the invasion! A chilling remake of the sci-fi classic, with Leonard Nimoy.
details.Title: Invasion Of The Body Snatchers

sunday_2015_11_29.name: Wing Commander
sunday_2015_11_29.title: WING COMMANDER
sunday_2015_11_29.description: In the year 2564, Earth is under attack by the frog-like warriors of the Kilrathi empire - and a new breed of young fighters emerges, blasting into space to save the planet!

details.Cast: Freddie Prinze Jr., Matthew Lillard, Saffron Burrows, Jurgen Prochnow, Tcheky Karyo, David Warner, David Suchet, Ginny Holder, John Bondi, Ken Bones, Richard Dillane, David Fahm, Fraser James, Simon MacCorkindale, Mark Powley, Hugh Quarshie, Raph Taylor
details.Description: In the year 2564, Earth is under attack by the frog-like warriors of the Kilrathi empire - and a new breed of young fighters emerges, blasting into space to save the planet!
details.Title: Wing Commander

sunday_2015_11_29.name: Guardians Of The Galaxy
sunday_2015_11_29.title: GUARDIANS OF THE GALAXY
sunday_2015_11_29.description: The Marvel comic comes to life! Five crazy loners - including a sharpshooting raccoon and a humanoid tree - discover they must band together to save the universe in this whip-smart, wise-cracking sci-fi adventure.

details.Cast: Chris Pratt, Zoe Saldana, Dave Bautista, Vin Diesel, Bradley Cooper, Lee Pace, Michael Rooker, Karen Gillan, Djimon Hounsou, Benicio Del Toro, John C Reilly, Glenn Close, Laura Haddock, Sean Gunn, Peter Serafinowicz, Christopher Fairbank
details.Description: The Marvel comic comes to life! Five crazy loners - including a sharpshooting raccoon and a humanoid tree - discover they must band together to save the universe in this whip-smart, wise-cracking sci-fi adventure.
details.Title: Guardians Of The Galaxy

sunday_2015_11_29.name: WarGames
sunday_2015_11_29.title: WARGAMES
sunday_2015_11_29.description: Matthew Broderick stars as a computer gaming whiz who hacks into a military network, and accidentally starts the countdown to World War III. Can he stop the countdown before it launches the ultimate endgame?

details.Cast: Matthew Broderick, Dabney Coleman, Ally Sheedy, John Wood, Barry Corbin, Juanin Clay
details.Description: Matthew Broderick stars as a computer gaming whiz who hacks into a military network, and accidentally starts the countdown to World War III. Can he stop the countdown before it launches the ultimate endgame?
details.Title: WarGames

sunday_2015_11_29.name: Fire In The Sky
sunday_2015_11_29.title: FIRE IN THE SKY
sunday_2015_11_29.description: In the White Mountains of Arizona, a man disappears after being hit by a light from the sky. When he suddenly reappears five days later, he has terrifying memories of an alien abduction.

details.Cast: D.B. Sweeney, Robert Patrick, Craig Sheffer, Peter Berg, James Garner, Henry Thomas, Bradley Gregg, Noble Willingham, Kathleen Wilhoite, Georgia Emelin, Scott MacDonald, Wayne Grace
details.Description: In the White Mountains of Arizona, a man disappears after being hit by a light from the sky. When he suddenly reappears five days later, he has terrifying memories of an alien abduction.
details.Title: Fire In The Sky

sunday_2015_11_29.name: The Thing
sunday_2015_11_29.title: THING, THE
sunday_2015_11_29.description: Exciting, gory remake of the sci-fi classic: a frozen survivor of an ancient space ship thaws out and wreaks havoc in a remote Antarctic outpost. Directed by John Carpenter ("Halloween").

details.Cast: Kurt Russell, Wilford Brimley, T.K. Carter, Richard A Dysart, Richard Masur, Donald Moffat, David Clennon, A. Wilford Brimley, Keith David
